arv16:14: yad-yad-eva karma kariṣyāmi kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā | tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākaṁ pratisaṁvedayiṣyāmi |
arv16:18: Yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti | tān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati ||
arv16:21: Yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati | tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati ||
arv16:24: Yān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati | tān dharmān samādhīndriyeṇa ekāgrīkaroti ||
arv16:27: Yān dharmān samādhīndriyeṇa ekāgrīkaroti | tān dharmān prajñendriyeṇa pratividhyate sa teṣu dharmeṣu pratyavekṣaṇa-jātīyo bhavati ||
